selectedVerses.text: Behold, the wages of the laborers who mowed your fields, which you kept back by fraud, are crying out against you, and the cries of the harvesters have reached the ears of the Lord of hosts.
The voice of the LORD cries to the city--and it is sound wisdom to fear your name: "Hear of the rod and of him who appointed it!
But they were urgent, demanding with loud cries that he should be crucified. And their voices prevailed.
From out of the city the dying groan, and the soul of the wounded cries for help; yet God charges no one with wrong.
Wisdom cries aloud in the street, in the markets she raises her voice;
